lexUnit.name: sit.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be or cause to be in a position in which one's weight is supported by one's buttocks rather than one's feet and one's back is upright.

sentence.text: Like a big ninny sitting there bemoaning your fate .
They sat facing each other , so they might look as much as they wished , and then began to talk .
He went back to the piano and sat looking at the keys -- afraid to play .
My master just sat staring into the flames of the fire .
Because he sat most nights on his own and looking very much removed from the whole crowd , very dark-browed and quiet , we speculated endlessly on his story .
Chrissy was sitting speculating on this question , trying to come up with even one course of action apart from confronting those involved , which she firmly believed would mean her death .
In old age she sat for long periods by her bedroom window , looking out over roof-tops to distant church spires and tower blocks .
The Collector had sat a good deal in this chair over the past few days and it had come to affect his habits of thought .
Sara Glynn sat opposite Wycliffe in the big , rather gloomy room with its dark wallpaper , over-varnished oil paintings in gilt frames , and leather-upholstered chairs .

Beside the fire sat Doctor Jekyll , looking white and ill .
Nearby sat two effeminate-looking men ; there was also a baby in a cradle .

Her brother sat opposite her with his back to the door devouring hunks of bread smothered with a mixture of peanut-butter and strawberry jam .
We had to sit outside , we could n't speak .
He sat quiet for another moment , and then began raging .
For a moment longer he sat frozen , then just as Jezrael cannoned into him he knocked the scalding can away .

At last he relaxed his grip on her back and pulled himself up to sit straight in the purgatorial chair .
The King followed the gesture , then sat straight in the saddle , his hand to his eyes .
I was sitting upright in a pine coffin high on a marble pedestal -- Yes , it was the one I 'd dreamt the night before I got my results .
It reminds me of days in the Wolf Cubs when we sat around Akela and heard about Mowgli .
He ate the food that was provided with the avidness of those who sat around him .
Greg turned in surprise and looked at Rachel who was sitting at her desk writing up some reports .
Liam Devlin sat at the piano in the Lights of Lisbon , a cigarette dangling from the corner of his mouth , a glass of wine on one side .
Miguelito sat at the saloon table .
In my new mood , I went over to the solitary man and said easily , pulling out a chair , ` May I sit at your table ? "
Sarah sat quietly at the table in the room , and looked at her hands .
I now sat by her bedside and worked out ratios .
And this time there was a woman sitting by the fire .
I 'm looking forward to getting back home and sitting by the fire .
But one day , as he sat by a mountain stream , he actually looked at a flower , and for the first time in ten years he realized how beautiful something living could be .
I do n't want you sitting here by yourself , all alone .
He was still sitting in the same chair , staring into space like a man in a trance .
Cowley sat stiffly in one of the leather armchairs , not at all happy with what Hogan had just told him .
I sat in the passenger seat and nursed my plaster cast .
Lee sat sideways on the crossbar and Philip freewheeled down the hill .
Ruth sat on the loo and held her head in her hands .
Who was green and sat on the throne ?
Gurder , Angalo and Pion sat under a bush .
Lewis-Ann sat under a huge umbrella , fully clothed , complaining bitterly about being too hot .

I sat there for about ten minutes and then I came out .

Philip sat down beside him .
I spun round and sat down on the pavement , a ringing noise in my head .
